subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Several top N.F.L. players have injuries and will miss Week 6. The Bengals’ Carson Palmer will not play against the Jets, and the Seahawks’ Matt Hasselbeck will probably miss the Packers game. Eagles running back Brian Westbrook will miss his second game in three weeks. Browns tight end Kellen Winslow will spend a second night in a hospital with an undisclosed illness that could keep him out of Monday night’s game against the Giants.
